message.name: ERR_CANNOT_FIND_PODLOADER_CLASS
message.locale: "The page loader failed to find a loader class for the Pod %1s. Check the configuration settings for Pod loaders in the %2s code table. [PLE001]"

message.name: ERR_FAILED_PAGECONFIG_LOAD
message.locale: The page loader failed to load the Page Configuration record. The record may contain malformed XML. [PLE002]

message.name: ERR_FAILED_PAGECONFIG_READ
message.locale: The page loader failed to read the Page Configuration record. [PLE003]

message.name: ERR_PAGECONFIG_RECORD_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The page loader failed to find a default PageConfig record for the pageID %1s. [PLE004]

message.name: ERR_USERPAGECONFIG_RECORD_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The page loader failed to find a default UserPageConfig record for the pageID %1s. [PLE005]

message.name: ERR_INVALID_POD_CONTAINER_COORDINATES
message.locale: The Pod Container grid position [ %1d, %2d] is not valid. [PLE006]

message.name: ERR_UNAVAILABLE_POD_CONTAINER_COORDINATES
message.locale: Failed to insert Pod %1s into Pod Container grid position [%2s, %3s]. This position is already filled by the Pod %4s [PLE007]

message.name: ERR_NO_POD_DETAILS_SUPPLIED
message.locale: Failed to add Pod %1s to the Pod Container. The Pod 'node' argument was null. [PLE008]
